entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023
